name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MapSnap.ai - Travel Itineraries to Google Maps™ Lists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MapSnap.ai: Google Maps™ Lists Made Easy!
MapSnap.ai makes it easier than ever to visualize your travel plans on a map! This powerful Chrome extension allows you to convert any travel itinerary into a customized Google Maps™ list with just a couple of clicks.

Why use MapSnap.ai?
* Seamless Integration: Simply paste your itinerary—whether it’s from a blog post, a PDF, or even a ChatGPT conversation—into the extension, and let the latest advanced AI extract all relevant locations.
* Easy Google Maps Lists: MapSnap.ai generates a new Google Maps list for you, complete with an engaging title, description, and a short excerpt for each location. You'll see your entire trip laid out in chronological order, making it easier to plan and navigate.
* Enhanced Travel Experience: With your itinerary in Google Maps, you can easily review your trip, mark must-see places, and enjoy the convenience of having all your locations in one place.

Free vs. Premium
Free Version: Process up to 10 locations from your itinerary—perfect for shorter trips or a quick preview.
Premium Version: The premium subscription of MapSnap.ai is perfect for those looking to manage more complex trips with ease. It leverages the most advanced AI for even more accurate and detailed travel lists. Premium users retain all the features of the free version, such as custom titles and descriptions for locations, but without any limitations on location count or itinerary length, offering superior performance for a low monthly fee.

Privacy First
We respect your privacy. The itineraries you provide and the created location lists are never saved or shared by the application after being analyzed by the AI model. Your data remains private and secure.
Note: As with all AI-powered tools, the results can vary with each use. Re-running the same itinerary might yield different outcomes.
